title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 91: Featuring Sheldon Souray + Caps Are Cup Champs
description:
This week's FridayÂ episode was recorded right after the Washington Capitals won their first Stanley Cup so we kick it off by breaking down the game and the series to explain why D.C. was better than Sin City. Our guest Sheldon Souray, a certified man rocket, then joins us for a lengthy chat about his career including: what it was like to wear the bleu blanc et rouge, what he misses about the game, his time in Edmonton, the current state of the game, Montreal, and a story about the legend himself, Bob Probert.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
